author: Beniaminek
title: Go-kart
review: A sweet little car. I don't know what function he could perform in my city. Probably as a cart trolley for donuts for the rest of the police station: D

author: Odeinoichus
title: 2020 Police Car Polybag.
review:
Set #30366 Police Car: Surprisingly despite LEGO City Police having a large number of Polybags there are only two official releases with the name Police Car. One from 2017 and this 2020 set. We have seen other four-wheeled Police Polybag sets, 4x4 vehicles and the like, but none of the sets are meant to be actual cars.

Pros:

  • Model included is fast and easy to build.
  • Female Officer included as driver.

Cons:

  • Car model seems rather box-like, not as streamlined or curved as the model could have been. Hindering aerodynamic look of the set.
  • No proper sirens on Police Car Model.

Overall opinion

Comparing the two models, the one from 2017 has a similar blocky design look making it less car-like than it could have been. That being said this is a pretty similar build to the 2017 model, so the two together match in appearance. It’s a very decent little set, the problem is I’m not very thrilled with these offerings. I’d recommend it as a good special grade achieved present or something along those lines, but unless you’re a Polybag completionist I feel you’d get more out of a boxed set with a larger model to build compared to this set.

Somewhat Recommended.
